summary: Mary lives with her evil stepmom/sisters and slaves for them. At the high school masquerade ball, she gets to dance with her pop idol, Joey. Running home before midnight, she drops her Zune. Joey tries to find the girl who fits the Zune.
cast: Selena Gomez|Drew Seeley|Jane Lynch|Katharine Isabelle|Emily Perkins|Jessica Parker Kennedy|Marcus T. Paulk|Nicole LaPlaca|Alex Zahara|Stuart Cowan|Giacomo Baessato|Elle-Máijá Tailfeathers|Donald Adams|Jagoda Janik|Laura Carswell|Gina Chiarelli|Nicole Muñoz|Lynda Boyd|Garwin Sanford|Eevan Redon|Nick Jimenez|Tal Iozef|Tiffany Burns|Mia Aida Duran|Colin Foo|Lorena Gale|Danielle Dunn-Morris|Camille Mitchell|Michael Bilinsky|Stewart Iguidez|Taylor James Millar|Richard O'Sullivan|Matt Ward|Rick Gomez|Morgan Tanner|Kelsey Chace|Jennifer Oleksiuk|Teya Wild|Nathalie Heath|Megan Lawson|Kim Sato|Natasha Gorrie|Shay Kuebler|Kyle Vincente|Taylor James|Stephanie Sy|Liam Raymond Dib|Lindsey Evans|Sasha Kozak|Chris McNally
title: Una cenicienta moderna 2
